article_title: Got a health care grievance? There’s a place to complain
article_text:
Many Californian consumers don’t know where/how to file a health-related complaint

MyPatientRights.org is one route to resolving problems

Department of Managed Health Care fielded nearly 8,000 consumer complaints in 2014

article_metadata.news-keywords: California, Chronic, Care, Coalition, MyPatientRights.org, Liz, Helms, Shelley, Rouillard, state, Department, of, Managed, Health, Care, consumer, complaints, health
article_metadata.description: Your health insurance company denied your treatment. Or it won’t provide the prescription drug you need. Or you’ve got a billing dispute. Or your longtime doctor was dropped from your health plan.
article_metadata.title: Got a health care grievance? There’s a place to complain | The Sacramento Bee
